message.content:
To identify the costs of general management and administration, we look for the line item typically labeled as "Administrative Expenses" or similar.

From the given income statement:

| Account                | Amount       | Date       |
|------------------------|--------------|------------|
| Administrative Expenses| 1082287.97   | 2024-01-29 |

This clearly represents the costs associated with general management and administration of the entity as a whole.

Thus, the value of costs of general management and administration is **1082287.97**.

```json
{"solution": {"value": "1082287.97"}}
```
